Bouncing projectile bounce velocity:
*The lower the value, the higher the projectiles bounce.
Bouncing projectile animation speed:
*The higher the value, the slower the animation is.
Bouncing projectile lifespan
*The lower the value, the quicker the bouncing projectiles dissipate.

panel.title: Balrog (Hover) Behaviors

panel.field: 2 is the default behavior. (Balrog shoots mouth shots, then jump and hover towards the player.)
5 makes Balrog fly upwards vertically, then lands. Does not jump towards the player.
1, 0 or 7 makes Balrog stand in place and do absolutely nothing.
6 makes Balrog go into a constant fit, pulsing his landing behavior and endlessly spawning bouncing projectiles.
4 makes Balrog hover in place, then does a pulse, spawning bouncing projectiles.
3 just makes Balrog jump and hover. He will not shoot from his mouth.
**Other variables have NOT BEEN TESTED! Be careful if you experiment!
